amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to add thermal mid-wave infrared equipped low earth orbit satellites as a prioritized emerging technology for agencies to implement through public-private partnerships for wildfire mitigation and detection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obernolte amendment (A005) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Obernolte amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent. Amendment strikes and replaces section 303, subsection (e). Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Obernolte amendment (A005) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
